translation.en: In nomine Patris et Filii et Spiritus Sancti. Amen.
translation.fr:
In nomine Patris
et Filii et Spiritus Sancti, amen.

translation.en: Hannah.
Hannah.
God himself commands you,
depart from the body of Hannah Grace, you demon,
translation.fr: Retire-toi du corps de Hannah Grace, démon !

translation.en: along with every satanic power of the enemy,
along with every specter from hell.
Stop!
Hannah, I know you're in there.
translation.fr: Hannah, je sais que tu es là.

translation.en: You have to fight, baby.
Fight it, Hannah.
[SOBBING] You have to fight.
Baby, it's me.
Dad. Daddy's here, baby.
Dad. Honey. Baby. Dad.
[STUTTERING] You have to fight.
In the name of the Father, in the name of the Son,
translation.fr: Au nom du Père, du Fils et du Saint-Esprit...

translation.en: in the name of the Holy Spirit.
Hannah, stop!
DEMON: Your whore daughter is mine.
translation.fr: Ta salope de fille est à moi.

translation.en: She's mine forever.
Forgive me.
LISA [ON VOICE MAIL]: Meg. Hey, it's Lisa. I just talked to Dr. Lewis
translation.fr: Meg, c'est Lisa. J'ai parlé au Dr Lewis,

translation.en: and you're good to go, so maybe you can
come in this afternoon. Okay, bye.
translation.fr:
Essaie de passer cet après-midi.
À plus.

translation.en: You look nervous. Are you okay?
It's a job interview. I think I'm supposed to be nervous.
Okay. Come on, let's go get a coffee.
LISA: This will be good.
We'll go to meetings in the morning after our shifts end
translation.fr:
On ira aux réunions du matin
après le boulot,

translation.en: and I'll be three floors up, so if you need anything...
translation.fr:
et je serai 3 étages au-dessus,
si besoin.

translation.en: You know?
Thank you for this.
Don't thank me yet. You still have to meet Dr. Lewis.
translation.fr:
Avant de me remercier,
il faut que tu voies le Dr Lewis.

translation.en: DR. LEWIS: This job is not for everyone.
We've had three overnight intake assistants in the last six months alone.
translation.fr:
Trois agents mortuaires de nuit
ont défilé en six mois.

translation.en: Because of the hours? No, because it's a thankless, solitary position.
translation.fr:
- À cause des horaires ?
- Non, parce que c'est ingrat.

translation.en: The smell. You never get used to the smell.
translation.fr: Et l'odeur, on ne s'y fait jamais.

translation.en: I was a cop. I'm totally used to bad smells.
translation.fr:
J'ai été flic,
je m'y suis largement faite.

translation.en: Lisa mentioned that there were issues.
translation.fr:
Lisa m'a dit
qu'il y avait eu des problèmes.

translation.en: Yes. There were issues. But I'm much better now.
translation.fr:
Oui, c'est vrai,
mais je vais beaucoup mieux.

translation.en: Well, she assured me that you could handle the job.
translation.fr:
Elle m'a assuré
que vous étiez à la hauteur.

translation.en: Is it something you think you can handle?
I can handle it.
COMPUTER: Going down.
It gets to you after a while, being here.
People get creeped out.
Before you know it, their imaginations are running wild,
they're hearing things go bump in the night.
Not me.
I believe when you die, you die.
End of story.
Good.
COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
At night, you can't get in or out without swiping this card.
translation.fr:
La nuit, on ne peut entrer et sortir
qu'avec ce badge.

translation.en: If you lose it, hospital security has to let you in.
translation.fr:
Si vous le perdez,
la sécurité devra vous ouvrir.

translation.en: They will not be happy.
Most of the lights are on a sensor.
The rest you have to switch on manually.
translation.fr: Et il y a quelques interrupteurs.

translation.en: There are a lot of files that need to be entered into the system.
translation.fr:
Il y a beaucoup de données
à entrer dans la base.

translation.en: I hope you don't mind data entry. No, not at all.
translation.fr:
- Ça ne vous dérange pas ?
- Pas du tout.

translation.en: Men's room is down there, women's room is down there,
translation.fr:
Toilettes des hommes,
toilettes des femmes.

translation.en: and down there to the left is the incinerator room for cremation.
translation.fr:
Et au fond à gauche,
c'est la salle de crémation.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Intake bay.
DR. LEWIS: This intake bay is for drop-offs only.
translation.fr:
La zone d'admission
est réservée aux dépôts.

translation.en: No drop-off, no access.
And you never leave the premises while you're on duty. No exceptions.
translation.fr:
Vous ne devez quitter le bâtiment
sous aucun prétexte.

translation.en: [CHIMES] COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Well, you bring the cadaver up from the intake bay,
translation.fr:
Vous récupérez le corps
en zone d'admission

translation.en: and take it into the receiving room, which is over here.
translation.fr:
et vous l'amenez
en salle d'enregistrement, ici.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Image captured.
First you take an overview of the body and then close-ups
translation.fr: Vous prenez une vue d'ensemble, puis des gros plans de chaque lésion.

translation.en: of each individual injury.
translation.fr: puis des gros plans de chaque lésion.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Image captured. All right, you try.
Rigor mortis makes a corpse difficult to fingerprint.
translation.fr:
La rigidité cadavérique
complique le relevé d'empreintes.

translation.en: Now, if you press on the knuckle, it will extend the finger, and make it easier to handle.
translation.fr:
Quand vous appuyez sur une jointure,
le doigt se tend et c'est plus facile.

translation.en: Gently roll.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
This doohickey sends the prints to a crime database.
translation.fr:
On envoie tout ça
dans le fichier criminel.

translation.en: Green means they're ready to go. Red means they're not.
translation.fr:
Vert, c'est bon.
Rouge, c'est pas bon.

translation.en: Green...
Green means go.
Thanks, Moe. You bet, Doc.
The shift starts tomorrow night at 11, goes to 7 in the morning.
translation.fr:
Ce serait pour commencer demain,
de 23 h à 7 h.

translation.en: Any problems with that? Not at all.
translation.fr:
- C'est un problème ?
- Pas du tout.

translation.en: Well, thank you for the opportunity.
I promise you won't be disappointed.
Welcome to the team.
Thanks.
Hey, do you need to see my I.D.?
translation.fr:
Bonsoir.
Vous voulez une pièce d'identité ?

translation.en: Do you work here?
In the morgue. I'm Megan.
translation.fr: À la morgue, je suis Megan.

translation.en: Then no.
Hey, I'm Dave.
Megan. Nice to meet you.
And, you know, welcome to the graveyard shift.
Thanks.
COMPUTER: Morgue.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Who are you? Where's Larry?
translation.fr:
Vous êtes qui ?
Où est Larry ?

translation.en: I don't know who Larry is, but I'm Megan.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas,
mais moi, c'est Megan.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Morgue.
You've got to be the right kind to stomach a job like this.
translation.fr:
Tout le monde est pas fait
pour ce boulot.

translation.en: Personally...
I'm not what you'd call a people person.
Dead's the way I like them.
COMPUTER: Image captured.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
Green means go.
Goddamn it, Dave. Sorry.
Not funny.
I didn't mean to. I honestly just came down to check on you.
translation.fr:
Je suis désolé,
je venais voir si ça allait.

translation.en: Shit. I feel like an asshole. Forgive me?
translation.fr:
Merde, je me sens con.
Tu me pardonnes ?

translation.en: I'll never do it again.
Really not funny.
MAN 1: Why didn't you shoot me? MAN 2: Megan, do something.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi tu m'as pas tué ?
- Megan, réagis.

translation.en: MEGAN: I don't know what triggers it, really.
translation.fr:
Je sais pas
ce qui déclenche l'envie.

translation.en: A lot of things, I guess.
But I still have nightmares of what happened.
Put your hands up!
Me just...
standing there...
doing nothing.
I just freeze up and I can't move.
translation.fr:
Je suis paralysée,
je peux plus bouger.

translation.en: MAN [ON RADIO]: Officer down. Officer down.
It's okay. I've got you. I've got you.
I want it so bad sometimes.
The drink and the pills, I want them so bad.
Thank you, Megan, for sharing.
I just, um, need the rest of my stuff.
translation.fr:
Je viens chercher
le reste de mes affaires.

translation.en: My shift just ended, but if this is a bad time...
translation.fr:
Je sors du boulot
mais si je tombe mal...

translation.en: No. No, come in.
And you're still in your pajamas because...?
translation.fr:
T'es encore en pyjama
à cette heure-là ?

translation.en: I started a new job last night. A night job.
translation.fr: J'ai commencé un boulot, hier. Un boulot de nuit.

translation.en: That's great.
Doing what?
Overnight intake assistant at the morgue.
translation.fr:
Agent d'admission de nuit,
à la morgue.

translation.en: It's better than it sounds.
Yeah, I'm basically running the place at night, all on my own.
translation.fr:
En gros, c'est moi
qui tiens la boutique la nuit.

translation.en: Are you sure that's a good idea, you know...
translation.fr: Tu es sûre que c'est bien

translation.en: spending so much time alone right now?
Actually, I do. You know,
it keeps me from going out at night doing things I might regret in the morning.
translation.fr:
Ça m'évite de sortir le soir
et de le regretter le lendemain.

translation.en: It worked for Lisa and she thinks it could work for me, too.
translation.fr:
Ça a marché pour Lisa,
alors pourquoi pas pour moi.

translation.en: "Lisa"? My AA sponsor.
The nurse at the hospital.
She says it keeps her out of trouble working the night shift.
translation.fr:
Ça l'empêche de déraper,
de travailler la nuit.

translation.en: So, when a job opened up at the morgue, she thought of me.
translation.fr:
Alors, elle a pensé à moi
pour ce boulot.

translation.en: Yeah, still, too much time alone is never good for anyone.
translation.fr: Mais être trop seul, c'est jamais bon.

translation.en: Says the guy who moved out.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui es parti, je te rappelle.

translation.en: You didn't give me much of a choice.
translation.fr: Tu m'as pas laissé le choix.

translation.en: That's not true, Andrew. You know that's not true.
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai, Andrew, tu le sais.

translation.en: Since when are you concerned about the truth?
translation.fr:
Depuis quand
tu t'intéresses à la vérité ?

translation.en: I didn't come to...
I should go.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
I forgot my key. Could you open the door?
translation.fr:
J'ai oublié ma clé.
Vous pouvez m'ouvrir ?

translation.en: You don't work here.
Yes, I do. Just let me in.
Sir, back away from the door. No. No. No.
Sir. Let me in!
I'm going to call security. Back away from the door.
COMPUTER: Morgue. MAN: Let me in!
Let me in!
MAN [ON PHONE]: Security.
Hey, I had a homeless guy at the intake bay.
translation.fr:
Il y avait un sans-abri
dans la zone d'admission.

translation.en: MAN: Thanks for the heads-up. Yeah, we get that a lot.
translation.fr:
Merci pour l'info.
Ça arrive souvent.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Drop-off? Hey, yeah.
Ooh. You're new here.
Megan. Randy.
Could you give me a hand? I'm all alone tonight.
translation.fr: Tu peux m'aider ? Je suis tout seul.

translation.en: Sorry. I can't leave the premises.
translation.fr: Désolée, je n'ai pas le droit de sortir.

translation.en: Yes. Yeah. Stickler on the rules.
But I'll tell you right now,
if you don't help me get this thing inside,
translation.fr:
Si tu m'aides pas
à décharger ce truc,

translation.en: it's going to start to rot and decay. It's just going to blow up like a puffer fish.
translation.fr:
ça va pourrir
et exploser comme un fruit trop mûr.

translation.en: And then we're both going to lose our jobs.
translation.fr: Et on se fera virer tous les deux.

translation.en: Unless...
What do you think? All right, okay. Fine.
You're the best. My partner called in sick. Strep throat.
translation.fr:
Génial. Mon équipier m'a dit
qu'il était au lit avec une angine.

translation.en: Which is 100 percent grade-A bullshit because--
Do you want to grab that side? Yeah.
He is holing up with his psycho ex-girlfriend.
translation.fr:
Il est sous la couette
avec son ex-copine tarée.

translation.en: It seems like he should be making some new friends.
Yeah, I think he should probably pick a better psycho ex-girlfriend next time.
translation.fr:
Il devrait surtout changer
d'ex-copine tarée.

translation.en: So, I want to say thank you, by the way,
because the guy who used to have this job would never have just done that.
translation.fr:
Le gars d'avant
n'aurait jamais fait ça.

translation.en: He was a prick. Horrendous breath.
translation.fr:
C'était un con
et il puait de la gueule.

translation.en: How long have you been here? I just started.
translation.fr:
- T'es là depuis quand ?
- Je viens de commencer.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
MEGAN: What happened? RANDY: Oh, yeah, it's a bad one.
translation.fr:
- Il lui est arrivé quoi ?
- C'est assez moche.

translation.en: The cops found her in an alley. One, two, three.
translation.fr:
Quand les flics l'ont trouvée...
Un, deux, trois !

translation.en: Yeah, so the guy was still slicing her.
He took off. They still haven't found him.
translation.fr:
Il s'est enfui
et court toujours.

translation.en: Did they find out who he was? No clue.
translation.fr:
- On sait qui c'est ?
- Pas du tout.

translation.en: "Hannah Grace."
Yeah, that's what it said on her I.D.
I told you it was bad.
That's not even the insane thing. The insane thing is
translation.fr: Et je t'ai pas dit le plus dingue

translation.en: they found chloroform by her body.
translation.fr: il y avait du chloroforme à côté d'elle.

translation.en: What kind of a lunatic drugs a girl, smashes her head in,
translation.fr:
Faut être malade pour droguer une fille,
lui défoncer le crâne

translation.en: and then tries to burn her body after she's been dead?
translation.fr: et essayer de brûler son cadavre.

translation.en: It's someone trying to send a message.
translation.fr: Moi je dis, c'est un message.

translation.en: It could have been her pimp. It might have been a drug dealer.
translation.fr: Ça doit être son mac ou son dealer.

translation.en: It could have been a sex thing.
Thanks, Randy. I can take it from here. You got it. Yeah.
All right.
Thanks for the help, Megan.
It gets easier. I promise.
Thanks.
It's all part of the job.
COMPUTER: Error. Unable to load image.
COMPUTER: Error.
Unable to load image.
What?
"Username."
Megan Reed.
"Password."
Bye-bye, Megan.
Andrew Kurtz.
"Password."
Megan.
Brown.
Get out of here.
You're losing your mind.
It's freaking hot.
Dave?
Dave, you promised.
Oh, my God.
If you scream, I will have to slit your throat.
Do you understand?
Do you understand?
There's someone down here. Call the police now. MAN: What? [PHONE SLAMS CRADLE]
translation.fr:
- Sécurité.
- Il y a un intrus, appelez la police.

translation.en: MAN: "As we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.fr:
... comme nous pardonnons
à ceux qui nous ont offensés.

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation,
translation.fr:
Et ne nous laisse pas
entrer en tentation,

translation.en: but deliver us from evil."
Stop. Put the body down.
I've already called security. There's nowhere for you to go.
translation.fr:
J'ai appelé la sécurité,
vous ne vous en sortirez pas.

translation.en: Now, just stay calm. You don't understand.
translation.fr: Gardez votre calme. Tu ne comprends pas.

translation.en: DAVE: Megan!
Get off of me! Get off of me!
Please, listen to me!
You've got to destroy her body. GUARD: Get him up!
You're coming with us. Please, listen to me.
MAN: Listen. Listen. GUARD: Are you okay?
You have to destroy her body. You've got to destroy her body.
You don't know what you've done!
translation.fr: Tu sais pas ce que t'as fait !

translation.en: You don't know what you-- She's not dead!
translation.fr: Tu comprends pas ! Elle est pas morte !

translation.en: ANDREW [ON PHONE]: Megan, it's Andrew. I just heard what happened. Are you okay?
translation.fr:
Megan, c'est Andrew.
On m'a raconté. Ça va ?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine, but I'm going to have to call you back.
translation.fr: Oui, ça va, mais je te rappelle.

translation.en: Hey, can you open the door?
Hey. Are you okay?
translation.fr: Ça va ? Il t'a fait mal ?

translation.en: Did that guy hurt you? No. No, not really.
translation.fr: Ça va ? Il t'a fait mal ? Non, pas vraiment.

translation.en: [SIGHS] I'm fine. Do you want to call it a night?
translation.fr:
Ça va. Tu veux arrêter pour ce soir ?
Je peux te trouver un remplaçant.

translation.en: I can find someone else to cover your shift.
translation.fr:
Tu veux arrêter pour ce soir ?
Je peux te trouver un remplaçant.

translation.en: I'm okay. Seriously, Lisa, I'm fine.
Nobody is going to hold it against you
if you just want to get out of here.
translation.fr:
Personne te reprochera de partir. Je sais, mais je veux rester,
j'en suis capable.

translation.en: I know. But I want to stay. Okay? I can do this. I want to do this.
translation.fr:
Je sais, mais je veux rester,
j'en suis capable.

translation.en: But you don't have to. Lisa.
I need to do this.
What is it?
I know this is going to sound insane, but...
I heard a corpse breathe.
Breathe? Yes.
Like...
an exhale.
Corpses expunge air sometimes when they're moved.
translation.fr:
Les cadavres expulsent parfois de l'air
quand on les bouge.

translation.en: Dr. Lewis didn't tell you this?
translation.fr: Le Dr Lewis ne te l'a pas dit ?

translation.en: In his defense, he...
probably assumed I was smart enough to know that corpses can't breathe.
translation.fr:
il a dû penser que je savais
que les cadavres ne respirent pas.

translation.en: Are you hungry?
I can get us some take-out from the cafeteria.
translation.fr:
Je vais chercher un truc
à la cafétéria.

translation.en: Sure. Okay, come on.
You know, when that guy attacked me tonight...
my first instinct wasn't to run.
translation.fr: mon réflexe n'a pas été de fuir.

translation.en: You know, I wanted to defend myself,
to stop him.
I didn't freeze.
Why couldn't I have done that
translation.fr: Pourquoi j'ai pas réagi comme ça

translation.en: when there was a gun pointed at my partner?
And then none of this would have happened.
Look, it's just one step at a time.
This job is the next step.
translation.fr: Avec ce boulot, tu en franchis une.

translation.en: There is a cop upstairs who wants to talk to you.
translation.fr: Un flic demande à te parler, là-haut.

translation.en: I can cover down here if you want.
translation.fr: Je te relaie, si tu veux.

translation.en: How's your arm? Oh, it's good as new.
Do you want some fries?
Sure. Thanks. LISA: Here. See you.
You didn't have to come here. They already have my statement.
translation.fr:
T'étais pas obligé,
j'ai fait ma déposition.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I was in the area.
translation.fr: Je sais, mais j'étais dans le coin.

translation.en: Are you okay? He didn't hurt you?
translation.fr: Ça va ? Il t'a pas fait mal ?

translation.en: Just my ego. Did you I.D. him yet?
translation.fr: C'est l'ego qui a pris. Vous l'avez identifié ?

translation.en: No, he's not talking.
We'll know more once we get him to the station.
translation.fr:
On en saura plus
quand il sera au poste.

translation.en: You seem anxious.
Are you staying through the night?
That's the plan.
I just know how you get when you're stressed.
translation.fr: Je te connais, quand t'es stressée.

translation.en: Okay, look, I appreciate you coming here, but I've got things covered.
translation.fr:
Bon, c'est gentil d'être passé,
mais je gère.

translation.en: Is there something else?
I know this isn't the right time...
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est pas le moment...

translation.en: but when I picked up my stuff, there was something missing.
translation.fr:
mais il manque un truc,
dans mes affaires.

translation.en: A bottle of Xanax.
And you're assuming that I...
what, stole them from you?
Did you? [SCOFFS]
It's a valid question. You're not supposed to be around
translation.fr:
La question se pose,
tu dois pas toucher à ce type de médoc.

translation.en: controlled medications of any kind.
translation.fr:
La question se pose,
tu dois pas toucher à ce type de médoc. Il faut tout de suite que tu m'accuses.

translation.en: You misplace a bottle of pills and automatically assume this.
translation.fr: Il faut tout de suite que tu m'accuses.

translation.en: Why are you getting so defensive?
I'm not getting defensive. I'm getting pissed.
You know, it's as if you're completely incapable of giving me the benefit of the doubt.
translation.fr:
Tu me laisses jamais
le bénéfice du doute.

translation.en: If you ever need my help, I'm just a call away. Okay?
translation.fr: Si je peux t'aider, tu m'appelles, d'accord ?

translation.en: Actually, there is something you can help me with.
translation.fr: Tu peux m'aider pour un truc.

translation.en: I'll be right back.
How's it going? I'm good. How are you?
I'll just be another minute if that's okay.
translation.fr: J'en ai encore pour une minute.

translation.en: Yeah, no problem. Take your time.
translation.fr: Pas de souci, prends ton temps.

translation.en: Bases loaded, three-and-two count, down by three.
translation.fr:
Les bases sont pleines,
3 balles 2 strikes, menés à 3 points.

translation.en: The stakes could not be higher.
Here comes the pitch. It's a heater.
It's a grand slam!
Can you run these for me at the station?
The scanner broke down before I could run her prints.
translation.fr: Le scanner est tombé en panne.

translation.en: Her? Hannah Grace.
ANDREW: You already have her I.D.
I think that I.D. is fake. The picture on her license doesn't match.
translation.fr:
Son permis est un faux,
la photo ne correspond pas.

translation.en: Her eye color, it's different.
translation.fr: La couleur des yeux n'est pas la bonne.

translation.en: What? Once a cop...
Just get me the prints, okay?
You got it.
Dave?
I mean, seriously.
Dave?
Hello?
Dave, is that you?
Are you sure you gave me the right prints?
translation.fr:
T'es sûre
que c'est les bonnes empreintes ?

translation.en: Positive. The results are odd.
Why do you say that?
Because according to the prints, Hannah Grace has been dead for three months.
translation.fr:
D'après ces empreintes,
Hannah Grace est morte depuis 3 mois.

translation.en: It must be a glitch in the system. It wouldn't be the first time.
translation.fr:
Le système doit cafouiller,
pour changer.

translation.en: Is everything else okay?
Megan.
Yeah, thanks.
Wait, what?
Hey, Dave, where the hell are you, man?
Is everything all right?
The security cameras downstairs... Yeah?
translation.fr: Les caméras de sécurité de la morgue...

translation.en: Can I access the morgue footage?
I can't leave the desk unmanned, but...
translation.fr: Je peux pas quitter mon poste,

translation.en: here you go.
Thanks.
Come on, Megan. Just breathe.
Hey, can I talk to you for a sec?
Yeah. Excuse me.
So, I thought I saw someone in the bathroom.
translation.fr: J'ai cru voir quelqu'un, aux toilettes.

translation.en: When I went to check the security footage,
I mean, I could have sworn it was her.
translation.fr: et je suis sûre que c'était elle.

translation.en: Meg, who is "her"? What are you talking about?
I need to show you something.
There.
What is that?
I don't know.
Well, I mean, it looks like a shadow.
It's not a shadow.
Look, when that guy broke in...
he kept talking about the woman he killed...
translation.fr: a dit que la femme qu'il avait tuée,

translation.en: Hannah Grace, how she wasn't really dead.
I looked her up.
She died three months ago during an exorcism.
translation.fr:
elle est morte il y a 3 mois
lors d'un exorcisme.

translation.en: You know I don't believe in that kind of stuff, but...
translation.fr: Je crois pas à ces trucs-là, mais...

translation.en: ...this, to me, is not a shadow.
translation.fr: je pense pas que ce soit une ombre.

translation.en: What is this?
Lisa, I didn't take any.
Are you lying to me? No, okay?
You need to believe me on this one.
translation.fr: Il faut que tu me croies.

translation.en: I promise you, I didn't take any. I wanted to, but I didn't.
translation.fr:
Je te jure que j'en ai pas pris,
même si j'en ai eu envie.

translation.en: I've just had them in my bag for comfort. I promise.
translation.fr:
Je les gardais pour me rassurer,
je te le jure.

translation.en: Meg, do you...?
Do you remember when we were in meetings
and they started talking about coping mechanisms?
translation.fr:
quand ils ont parlé
de stratégie d'adaptation ?

translation.en: An addict's brain tries to find new ways to cope with stress.
translation.fr:
L'addiction est un moyen
de faire face au stress.

translation.en: Everything that has happened to you today, the stress that it has caused,
translation.fr:
Ce qui t'est arrivé aujourd'hui,
le stress subi,

translation.en: your brain is desperate to find a way to cope with it.
translation.fr:
ton cerveau cherche un moyen
d'y faire face.

translation.en: And it is going to do anything it can to convince you to use again.
translation.fr:
Alors, il va tout faire
pour te convaincre de replonger.

translation.en: My brain did not put a corpse on the security footage.
translation.fr:
Mon cerveau a pas mis un cadavre
dans l'image.

translation.en: Look, I don't know what that thing is,
translation.fr: Je sais pas ce que c'est,

translation.en: but what I do know is you're jumping to the least plausible explanation.
translation.fr:
mais tu es prête
à inventer n'importe quoi.

translation.en: And right now you've got to focus.
So, don't see things that aren't there.
Here. No.
I trust you.
Dave?
Are you okay?
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
RANDY: I brought you a present.
Can you give me a hand again? Sorry. I can't help you out.
translation.fr: Tu m'aides ? Je peux pas, après ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: Not after last time. What? Why? What happened?
translation.fr: Je peux pas, après ce qui s'est passé. Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ?

translation.en: You wouldn't believe me if I told you.
Okay. Well, try me.
MEGAN: So, it's obviously been a long night...
and I'm probably just remembering things wrong.
She had a huge wound...
translation.fr: Elle avait une très grosse entaille

translation.en: going down this side of her abdomen
translation.fr:
de ce côté de l'abdomen
quand tu l'as amenée.

translation.en: when you dropped her off. Correct?
translation.fr:
de ce côté de l'abdomen
quand tu l'as amenée. N'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: Yeah, I could have sworn that she did.
So, where is it now?
And her arm was banged up too, right?
Yeah. Have you checked the admittance photos?
translation.fr: Oui. Tu as vérifié sur les clichés ?

translation.en: The camera broke down and when I tried to scan her prints, the scanner died too.
translation.fr:
L'appareil photo et le scanner
sont tombés en panne à son arrivée.

translation.en: That's weird.
So, I had a friend run her prints at the police station.
translation.fr:
J'ai demandé à un ami policier
de vérifier ses empreintes.

translation.en: And?
Hannah Grace, she died three months ago during an exorcism.
translation.fr:
Hannah Grace est morte il y a 3 mois
au cours d'un exorcisme.

translation.en: Whoa. When that man broke in, he said she wasn't really dead,
translation.fr:
L'agresseur a dit
qu'elle n'était pas morte,

translation.en: and now it's almost like she's healing herself.
translation.fr:
et maintenant,
on dirait qu'elle guérit.

translation.en: Can I ask you a personal question?
How personal?
Why are you working the night shift at a morgue?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu travailles de nuit
dans une morgue ?

translation.en: Because it's my job.
No, no. You're smart and resourceful.
So, what happened?
You know what? Actually, it's not even-- I'm sorry. It's not my business.
[SIGHS] I had a rough patch a few years back and...
translation.fr:
J'ai connu une période difficile, et j'ai l'impression
que tu sais ce que c'est.

translation.en: I don't know, I guess I thought I saw that in you.
translation.fr:
et j'ai l'impression
que tu sais ce que c'est.

translation.en: I'm sure that there is a rational explanation for all of this.
translation.fr: Il y a sûrement une explication logique.

translation.en: You just-- Megan, you've got to be careful that you don't drive yourself crazy here.
translation.fr:
Il faut faire gaffe
à pas trop se monter la tête, ici.

translation.en: I know.
He's adorable.
I used to have a drinking problem.
And I would get drunk...
and lie and cheat and...
people told me that I was a dick sometimes.
translation.fr: On me traitait de con, parfois.

translation.en: All the time.
And then... this guy shows up...
translation.fr: Et puis, ce petit bout est arrivé

translation.en: and he made me want to be a better person.
translation.fr: et il m'a donné envie de faire mieux.

translation.en: So...
I quit drinking...
I quit lying...
and then I was finally able to be honest with the people that love me...
translation.fr:
et j'ai enfin pu être sincère
avec les gens qui m'aiment,

translation.en: because I was finally able to be honest with myself.
translation.fr:
parce que j'ai enfin pu être sincère
avec moi-même.

translation.en: If you ever want to talk, I'm the guy.
translation.fr: Si t'as envie de parler, je suis là.

translation.en: Thank you.
Have a good night. You, too. Get home safe.
translation.fr:
- Bonne nuit.
- Toi aussi. Rentre bien.

translation.en: Hey, I was just about to call you.
That bottle of Xanax that you were looking for...
I didn't take it.
Megan, you already told me this.
I found it in the medicine cabinet after you moved out.
translation.fr:
Tu l'avais laissé
dans l'armoire à pharmacie.

translation.en: And I should have packed it up with the rest of your things...
translation.fr:
J'aurais dû le mettre dans tes cartons,
mais...

translation.en: but I kept it.
I've just been feeling anxious lately...
translation.fr: Je suis angoissée, en ce moment,

translation.en: and I felt safer knowing that they were there.
translation.fr:
et ça me rassurait
d'en avoir quelque part.

translation.en: You know, in case I needed them.
Why are you telling me this?
Because I'm tired of lying.
Anyway, I'll drop them off tomorrow morning if you're there.
translation.fr:
Je passerai te le donner demain matin
si tu es là.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll be there. I'm glad you told me, okay?
translation.fr:
Je serai là.
Je suis content que tu me l'aies dit.

translation.en: Me, too. Bye. Bye.
COMPUTER: Going down.
This is Randy, drop-off complete.
Goddamn it.
Hello?
Randy.
Randy?
Randy.
Andrew.
Megan, go to security right now.
The guy who broke into the morgue killed the two officers transporting him to the station.
translation.fr:
L'agresseur de la morgue
a tué deux agents et s'est enfui.

translation.en: We have an APB out on him, but there's a chance he could make--
Move. ANDREW: Megan?
Open it.
Get the lift.
Do you see what's happening to her body?
translation.fr: Tu vois ce qui se passe ?

translation.en: She's healing.
She heals herself by killing people
and then she rests.
Why hasn't she killed you?
translation.fr: Pourquoi elle ne t'a pas tuée ?

translation.en: I don't know.
I believe you.
There's something evil hiding inside.
translation.fr: Une chose maléfique se cache en elle.

translation.en: The church...
said to walk away...
but I couldn't give up on my only child.
translation.fr:
Mais je ne pouvais pas abandonner
mon unique enfant.

translation.en: That's your daughter?
Not anymore.
Hannah struggled with depression...
translation.fr: Hannah a lutté contre la dépression

translation.en: anxiety.
It worked on her...
day after day...
till it broke her...
...found its way inside her body.
Is that when her eye changed?
translation.fr: C'est là que ses yeux ont changé ?

translation.en: That's the demon's mark.
No matter how many exorcisms they performed, it stayed.
translation.fr: Malgré toutes les séances d'exorcisme, il est resté.

translation.en: One last...
...attempt.
In the name of God, in the name of Jesus Christ...
translation.fr: Au nom de Dieu et de Jésus notre Seigneur,

translation.en: our Lord, be gone!
translation.fr: et de Jésus notre Seigneur, va-t'en !

translation.en: You have to understand...
...I did what I did...
...to save the lives of others.
But the demon was too powerful.
translation.fr: Mais le Mal était trop puissant.

translation.en: It stayed.
The next day, when we went to bury her...
translation.fr: Le lendemain, le jour de l'enterrement,

translation.en: ...her body, it disappeared from the mortuary.
translation.fr: son corps avait disparu de la morgue.

translation.en: Four people were dead.
We have to get her to the incinerator.
The knife wasn't enough.
The only way to destroy this thing is to burn her.
translation.fr:
Cette chose ne sera détruite
que par le feu.

translation.en: Anything else just slows her down.
translation.fr: Le reste ne fait que la ralentir.

translation.en: Come and get me!
No! Stop! [SCREAMING]
Stop!
Come on. Come on.
COMPUTER: Mezzanine.
COMPUTER: Going up.
COMPUTER: Arrived at mezzanine.
Officer Kurtz, reporting a 10-65.
I need backup at Boston Metro Hospital,
translation.fr:
Envoyez des renforts
au Boston Metro Hospital,

translation.en: possible homicide.
COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Megan?
Oh, my God.
Who's there? It's Officer Kurtz.
Megan's friend. Where is she? Yeah, I don't know.
translation.fr:
Je suis un ami de Megan.
Où est-elle ? J'en sais rien.

translation.en: Dave's missing, too.
Everything's down. What's going on down here?
translation.fr: Tout est coupé. Il se passe quoi, ici ?

translation.en: What happened? We have to get out of here.
translation.fr:
- Ça va ?
- Il faut partir d'ici !

translation.en: [SCREECHING NOISE] ANDREW: What the hell is that?
What? Oh, my God. Come on! Come on!
COMPUTER: Going down.
Hey, stop!
Let him go!
Andrew. Are you okay?
MEGAN: Okay, come on. Hurry. We don't have much time.
Go get help. Wait. What? Megan.
translation.fr:
- Va chercher de l'aide.
- Quoi ? Megan !

translation.en: No! Help me, please!
MEGAN: I'm 62 days clean...
...and I'm thankful for how far I've come.
translation.fr:
Je suis heureuse
d'être arrivée jusque-là.

translation.en: It's not easy.
And I know I have a long way to go...
translation.fr: Je sais que la route est encore longue,

translation.en: but I'm feeling stronger every day.
translation.fr: mais je me sens de plus en plus forte.

translation.en: Nothing's going to stop me now.
